name: BenchDNS25 Multi-Language Development Environment
postCreateCommand: echo 'Development environment ready! Multi-language DNS benchmarking tools available.' && ls -la /app/
onCreateCommand: groupadd --gid 1000 vscode && useradd --uid 1000 --gid vscode --shell /bin/bash --create-home vscode && echo 'vscode ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL' > /etc/sudoers.d/vscode
